maqras.text: Ut. L. R. These letters est proofs hoc scripture; profound Quran
Certainly those disbelieved wish they est submitters
Let them eat enjoy remain blinded wishful thinking they perfecit invenit out
Nos nunquam annihilated any community prout specific predetermined temporis
Finis any community nunquam advanced nor delayed
They dictus O vos received hoc reminder vos est crazy
Why vos non bring angels vos est truthful
Nos non send angels specific functions Alias non 1 respited
Absolutely nos revealed reminder absolutely nos preserve it
Nos sent (messengers) vos communities in the elapsus
Omnis temporis messenger iit them they ridiculed eum
Nos sic control minds guilty
Consequently they non believe in eum. Hoc est system abinde generations
Et si nos opened pro them gate into caelum quae they climb
they dictus Noster eyes deceived Nos bewitched
Nos locus galaxies in the caelum, adorned it beholders
Nos custos it omnis rejected devil
any de them sneaks listen mighty projectile testimentum chase eum back
Prout pro terra nos constructed it locus it stabilizers (montis) nos grew it perfect balance de everything
Nos factus it habitable vos ac creatures vos non perfecit provisus pro
ibi est nihil ut nos non suus infinite amounts thereof. Nos send it down precise measure
Nos send winds pollinators causa aqua advenit caelum vos drink Alias vos non keep it palatable
est nos control vita decessus nos est ultimate inheritors
Nos fully know those vos advance nos fully know those regress
Tuus Dominus surely summon them. He est Wise Omniscient
Nos created human est aetatis mud figulus clay
Prout pro jinns nos created them ante ut, blazing fire
Tuus Dominus dictus to angels ego creating human est aetatis mud figulus clay
Dodum ego perfect eum blow eum ex My anima vos fall prostrate ante eum
angels fell prostrate totus de them
Iblis (Satan). He refused est prostrators
He dictus O Iblis (Satan) why est vos non prostrators
He dictus ego non est prostrate human est Vos created aetatis mud figulus clay
He dictus Ergo vos get vos banished
Vos incurred My condemnation Feria Judgment
He dictus My Dominus respite me feria they resurrected
He dictus Vos respited
Dum specified feria temporis
He dictus My Dominus abinde Vos habet willed ut ego iit astray ego surely entice them terra; ego send them totus astray
those among Tuus worshipers devoted absolutely Vos alone
He dictus Hoc est juris est inviolable
Vos non habet power My servus! Vos unus habet power strayers subsequentis vos
Hell awaits them totus
It habet 7 gates Each gate get specific share de them
Prout pro righteous they enjoy gardens fons
Iniit therein peaceful secure
Nos remove totus jealousy their hearts Like 1 familia they est adjacent furnishings
Nunquam testimentum they suffer any fatigue therein; nunquam testimentum they evicted therefrom
Inform My servus ego est Forgiver Merciful
